answer: Cosentyx's reported net sales in the immunology segment for the full year 2024 were USD 13.15 billion, compared to USD 13.09 billion in 2023. These reported results increased by 1.6% YoY, while on a constant currency basis, the reported results increased by 18% YoY (for Q4 2024), and for the full year 2024, the reported growth was 12% (on a constant currency basis).
